ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the three reviewers of this manuscript for their constructive feedback on the manuscript.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation within the project entitled “Rafforzamento del sistema di sorveglianza e controllo delle malattie infettive in Etiopia”—AID 011330. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, interpretation, or preparation of the manuscript. The corresponding author had full access to all the data in the study and had the final responsibility for the decision to submit for publication.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The data that support the findings of this study are available from the corresponding author upon reasonable request.
